scripts.deploy-external:lightlink: CHAIN=lightlink yarn setup && graph deploy --node https://graph.phoenix.lightlink.io/rpc --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ lightlink/sablier-v2-lightlink
scripts.deploy-studio:arbitrum: CHAIN=arbitrum yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-arbitrum yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:arbitrum-sepolia: CHAIN=arbitrum-sepolia yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-arbitrum-sepolia yarn deploy-studio

scripts.deploy-studio:base-sepolia: CHAIN=base-sepolia yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-base-sepolia yarn deploy-studio

scripts.deploy-studio:chiliz: CHAIN=chiliz yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-chiliz yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:experimental: CHAIN=experimental yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-experimental yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:gnosis: CHAIN=gnosis yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-gnosis yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:iotex: CHAIN=iotex yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-iotex yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:linea: CHAIN=linea yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-linea yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:mainnet: CHAIN=mainnet yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2 yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:mode: CHAIN=mode yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-mode yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:optimism: CHAIN=optimism yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-optimism yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:optimism-sepolia: CHAIN=optimism-sepolia yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-optimism-sepolia yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:polygon: CHAIN=polygon yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-polygon yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:scroll: CHAIN=scroll yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-scroll yarn deploy-studio
scripts.deploy-studio:sepolia: CHAIN=sepolia yarn setup && NAME=sablier-v2-sepolia yarn deploy-studio

scripts.template: yarn template-chain && yarn template-config && yarn template-env
